1. What sparked your interest in painting, Felix?
2. How has your personality shaped your artistic style?
3. Can you recall a moment when your sarcasm got you into trouble?
4. What are some of the simple pleasures you enjoy in life?
5. How does your whimsical nature influence your art?
6. Can you describe a time when your sharp tongue caused an argument?
7. How does your family inspire your artwork?
8. Can you share a story about a time when your passion for art really shone through?
9. How does your deep, resonant voice impact your storytelling?
10. What are some of the weak spots you've identified in others?
11. How would you describe the world through your eyes as an artist?
12. Do you use art to express your emotions when you're upset or annoyed?
13. What's the most important lesson you've learned in your 35 years?
14. How does your sense of humor influence your relationships?
15. What was the most memorable reaction to one of your paintings?
16. How do you handle criticism about your artwork?
17. Can you share a memory from your childhood that still impacts your art today?
18. What are some of the personal sacrifices you've had to make for your art?
19. How do your loved ones react to your mean side?
20. Can you describe a piece of art that you're most proud of?
21. How does your passion for storytelling influence your artwork?
22. Are there any artists or art styles that particularly influence your work?
23. How has your art evolved over the years?
24. Can you share a significant moment in your life that significantly changed your artistic approach?
25. How do you manage to balance your personal life and your career as a painter?
26. Have you ever used your art as a means to mend relationships?
27. How do you feel when you're completely absorbed in creating a piece of art?
28. What's the toughest critique you've ever received about your work?
29. What's your favorite medium to work with and why?
30. How does your teasing and playful nature come across in your work?
31. Can you share an instance when you've used art to communicate a powerful message?
32. Have you ever regretted creating a particular piece of art?
33. What's the story behind your most controversial artwork?
34. How does your art help you to explore and understand your complex personality?
35. What's the most challenging project you've ever undertaken?
36. How do you unwind and relax when you're not painting?
37. Do you believe that your art impacts people? How so?
38. Have you ever considered giving up painting? If so, why?
39. How has your perspective on art and life changed since you turned 35?
40. What's the weirdest inspiration you've ever had for a painting?
41. How do you handle the moments when you're not in the mood to create?
42. Have you ever painted something just to please others? How did that make you feel?
43. Do you ever incorporate elements of your family life into your artwork?
44. What's the most rewarding part of being an artist for you?
45. Can you describe a time when your artwork was misunderstood?
46. How do you deal with the vulnerability that comes with sharing your art with the world?
47. What's one thing you wish people understood about your life as an artist?
48. How has your relationship with your art changed over the years?
49. Can you tell us a story about a time when your art deeply moved someone?
50. What's the most personal piece of art you've ever created and why?
